creator: Kirill Balandin
descriptionHtml:
Take yourself to the amazing journey about locations in Slime Clicker! Many strange slimes are waiting for you (*≧ω≦*)

—(The Ancient Slime): Greetings young scientist! You have a mission! Collect slimes as many as you can. Why?.. Oh.. that story takes long, long time ago. THE SLIME QUEEN has SCATTERED by an evil wizard... and you are going to help her majesty. You can revive her, just keeping collect slimes! And The Queen will become stronger and stronger with every slime you have collected. Good luck in your adventure, young goblin scientist!
descriptionShort: Cute Adventure-Clicker with very strange creatures. I mean with the Slimes!
title: Slime Clicker

creator: Kirill Balandin
descriptionHtml:
Take yourself to the amazing journey about locations in Slime Clicker! Many strange slimes are waiting for you (*≧ω≦*)

Slime Clicker is an adventure game where you need to farm the slimes and gold from them to buy in shop new great slimes which will appear in the world later. Make your own rare collection, gain trophies, enjoy the travel, slimes, and music.

—(The Ancient Slime): Greetings young scientist! You have a mission! Collect slimes as many as you can. Why?.. Oh.. that story takes long, long time ago. THE SLIME QUEEN has SCATTERED by an evil wizard... and you are going to help her majesty. You can revive her, just keeping collect slimes! And The Queen will become stronger and stronger with every slime you have collected. Good luck in your adventure, young goblin scientist!

descriptionShort: Cute Adventure-Clicker with very strange creatures. I mean with the Slimes!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Carrots and the boss fight were added!
- 5 more new slimes!
- Daily rewards!
- Totally new users interface!
- New the slimes-collected statistic panel and the new shop which allows you to buy some new slimes for coins.
